attributes.action: Cancel , or at least aid current year 10's in their GCSE next year.
attributes.additional_details: Current year 10's missed out 6 months of education last year , and this year we are missing more.Does the government really think that we will manage to gain and take in the same amount of knowledge as we would if we were in school full time , it is absolutely obserd to think this.GCSE exams are causing an abundant amount of stress and anxiety to year 10 students.We cannot possibly learn everything in the criteria in this amount of time , at home.Something impossible is being put upon us!
attributes.background: Cancel or at least aid current year 10s in their GCSE next year.Give us permission to take books into all GCSE , and give us a list of all topics that will be mentioned in the papers.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Cancel A-level and GCSE exams 2022: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566760

Reduce content for 2022 A-level and GCSE exams: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566803

Review 2022 exam arrangements for GCSEs and A-levels: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566569
